name: PrismScroll Pathfinder
description:
Why.
PrismScroll is the last Pathfinder Character Sheet Builder you’ll ever need to download! Beautifully designed for your mobile devices, PrismScroll offers the most powerful combination between clean aesthetic and impressive functionality. Manage all your Pathfinder characters in one place.

Feedback.
PrismScroll is devoted to creating an exceptional experience for all levels of Pathfinder players. Backed by 3 years of experience in the digital character sheet market, we're very thankful for all the great feedback we've received thus far. Our team is dedicated to providing continuous updates with the goal of becoming the go-to digital character sheet. We read and respond to all user reviews because we know that YOU are going to be the ones that make PrismScroll the best it can be.

Support.
You will not get better support from any other Pathfinder app than from PrismScroll. Join our active Discord community and get involved today!



Standard Features.
Single Tap Character Sheet Generation. No Ads

Mobile Sheet. Compact, Mobile Friendly Digital PrismScroll designed character sheet.

Dark Mode. PrismScroll takes advantage of the Dark Mode feature on your phone providing you with a consistent experience with your device settings.

Spell Tracking. Keep track of your total, expended spell slots using our toggle-able spell page.

Equipment. Keep track of all your equipment and treasures. Track quantity of each item and current carried weight.

Community Polls. Get involved by voting in our content polls. Each day you can cast your vote on what you want to bring next to PrismPathfinder. The more the vote and the larger the community gets, the faster new updates will hit the app!


PrismPro Features.
Unlimited Character Creation. Test out more builds and quickly spin up NPC's for your games with unlimited character creation

More Content Poll Influence. Your votes will now count for 3 votes, bringing new content to the app faster for everyone.

Journal. A new journal page in your digital character sheet for each new character that you make.

Character Folders. Organize all your unlimited characters into folders for ease of use and viewing.



Join Us!
Download the app now and help us build the Best Digital Pathfinder Character Sheet to date!

Social Media.
Find us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @prismscroll
